name: Decrypto
description:
Decrypto is part of our intelligent game series. It is a game about decoding ciphers.

In each level you need to decrypt a word. You have your first hint unlocked in every level. First hint is associated with previous level answer. When you complete a level you get 1 help point and experience points. In order to increase your rank, you need to get experience points.

Now go hack and have fun !
